body.p: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary as it is no longer required for the National Joint Registry Data Set.
See National Joint Registry Data Set for the latest version of the data set.

p.b: The last live version of this item is available in the November 2012 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
